import React, { Component } from 'react' import IMG1 from '../images/Apartly.png' import IMG2 from '../images/spexor.jpg' import IMG3 from '../images/grey_background.jpg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Grid } from '@mui/material' const portfolio = [ { id: 1, company: "Apartly", title: "Web and brand design", image: IMG1, url: "apartly-designwork" }, { id: 2, company: "Bosch startup spexor", title: "Thesis: Designing a B2B app for spexor", image: IMG2, url: "bosch-spexor" }, { id: 3, company: "unify", title: "JIBS Entrepreneurship Challenge 2020", image: IMG3, url: "unify-app" } ] export default class Work extends Component { componentDidMount(){ document.title = "Vivien Geschwind | Portfolio" } render() { return (

Hi, I'm Vivien.

{/*

I like designing digital experiences and helping people make their visions visible to the world.

*/}

I'm a happy and open-minded designer in Stockholm who likes to create digital experiences.

{ portfolio.map(({id, company, title, image, url}) => { return (
{company}
{title}
 ) }) }
"People ignore design that ignores people."
Frank Chimero

About my work

Good, thoughtful design is an essential ingredient for the success of your project. As a UI/UX Designer, I design websites and apps that address user needs in a user-friendly manner, with emerging technologies and trends in mind. Whether you have your project already up and running or you need a whole concept from scratch for your idea, I am happy to support you at any stage of your project.

Want to work with me? Letâ€™s have a coffee.

What I do

  • Concept
  • Wireframing
  • Testing

What I work with

  • Adobe CC
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Xcode
  • Zeplin
  • Git

) } }
